title: It's Morbin' Time again, thanks to the new Marvel's Midnight Suns DLC
description: Morbius has joined the team, and he's gonna morb all over the bad guys.

description: The RTS will be out in June.

title: Blizzard says Diablo 4's repetitive dungeon designs are intentional
description: Don't judge a Diablo 4 beta dungeon by its layout.

description: I hate Diablo 3, but I might love Diablo 4.

title: Blizzard addresses Diablo 4 beta test complaints: This was not a 'marketing beta'
description: If the weekend beta was a little rougher than you expected, Diablo general manager Rod Fergusson says that's because it was an actual beta test.

title: Good news, edgelords! Destiny just dropped an (almost) all-black shader for everyone
description: Players have been begging to goth up their gear since forever, but Bungie has been reluctant until now.

title: Mirror's Edge and Bad Company 2 are being removed from sale forever
description: The delisting comes ahead of the shutdown of their online services at the end of the year.

title: Raja Koduri, a leader in Intel's graphics division, is leaving the company to work on AI
description: Koduri joined Intel to help the company move into graphics, among other projects, and now he's leaving to create a company working on generative AI for gaming and more.

title: Mask of the Rose, my most-anticipated game of 2023, just got delayed
description: All I want is to court horrors unknowable. Is that so much to ask?

title: This keyboard designed for a single rhythm game is literally UwU

description: Try your luck with the Purveyor of Curiosities.

title: EVE Online studio CCP Games is making a blockchain game
description: The new "triple-A" game will be separate from EVE Online but set in the EVE universe.

title: This new open world game has an even better treasure map quest than Red Dead Redemption
description: Tchia has almost two dozen hand-drawn treasure maps, sending you on a hunt across a beautiful archipelago.

title: Tchia treasure map guide: How to find and open every hidden chest
description: There are 21 treasure maps in Tchia. Here's how to find every treasure chest in the game.

title: Nvidia says its new AI tools are like a chip foundry for large language models

title: Alienware's 500Hz 1080p gaming monitor is yours for $829 because of course it's unfeasibly expensive

title: Diablo 4's Barbarian is due for a buff, but you might want to enjoy your OP frost Sorcerer while you can
description: Dunno why the Barbarian doesn't just throw frost orbs at everyone. Seems like a skill issue.

title: 2000's action-RPG Wander Wonder looked like Zelda, but it's so much more than a simple link to the past
description: This adventure, released in three episodes in a Japanese magazine, is from the studio best known for the Puyo Puyo puzzle games.

title: Yup, PC monitor sales have cratered too and are getting worse
description: Add monitors to the list along with CPUs, GPUs, and the rest.

description: Git gud (at healing).

title: Respawn reckons Apex Legends will be around for '10, 15 years or more' and it's opened a new studio to make it happen
description: The new Wisconsin studio will focus on live services development, while Respawn as a whole thinks about the game's accessibility for new players.

title: Diablo 4 makes me feel guilty as hell
description: Tonal perfection generates a heavenly feedback loop

title: The final issue with Intel's best budget gaming chip has now been laid to rest
